summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds and/or easements to portions of Block 13, Hillman City Division No. 6; portion of Block 1, Brighton Beach Orchard; and portions of Tracts 35, 36, 45, 46 and 76, Kelsey's Brighton Beach Acre Tracts, for street purposes and laying off 40th Avenue South and 44th Avenue South. (40th Avenue South, et al; Paving, etc.; LID 6617)
